latest_articles.title: What to Expect at the Olympic Opening Ceremonies, From the Man Behind Them
latest_articles.summary: Marco Balich has helped design grand spectacles at more than half a dozen Olympics. On Friday, he’ll do it again, on home turf in Italy.

latest_articles.title: The Olympics Are a Show Of Global Harmony. The World is Anything But.

latest_articles.title: Residents of Cortina, a Winter Olympics Hub, Are Angry About All the Construction
